scripts.test:php: wp-env run tests-wordpress --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/coco-visualtransition' composer run punit
scripts.test:php:watch: wp-env run tests-wordpress --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/coco-visualtransition' composer run punit-watch
scripts.db:options: npm run wpcli db query "SELECT option_name FROM wp_options WHERE option_name LIKE '%coco_%';"
scripts.wordpress:install: wp-env run cli wp core download --path=wordpress
